      In Kineshma, a pervert was detained, showing sex to children

      Crimes and criminality 0 874

      They were a 22-year-old local resident.

      In Kineshma, a passenger bus burned down on Szhorsa Street

      Crimes and criminality 4 641

      Previous cause is a safety breach in repair.

      The Kinesh Basketballists won the divisional segment of the school league CEC-BASKET

      Sport 0 205

      Fenix SBC won all games.

      Roman Mitropfanov, Maxim Sharov and Mikhail Dementiev of Ivanov province died in the SVR area

      Society and Life 1 1744

      Governor Stanislav Vosresenski expressed his condolences to his native and close heroes.

      As a result of the snow, UCH Kineshma was transferred to high-readiness mode

      CFC and improvement 4 567

      The road schedule will continue all weekend.

      A baptism in Tion Lukhsky ' s paternity visited 80 people

      Society and Life 0 958

      All interested could have warmed up hot tea, had some sandwiches.

      Kineshians need to be re-registered

      Society and Life 1 542

      Re-registration takes place before 1 April of this year.

      The residents of the Volkk reported an increase in the cost of the bus to 34 roubles

      Transport and roads 2 624

      As in Kineshma, new prices will allow passengers to travel from 3 February.

      In the week of Kineschemsky, 35 deaths and 8 births were registered.

      Society and Life 9 775

      There were 15 divorces for 12 marriages.

      The Kinesh gymnastics won a bronze at the All-Russian Rusi competitions

      Sport 0 388

      Training athlete Alain Pakow.

      Locations on the al-Navolok area of 1,300 square metres will be leased to the store

      Economy and business 3 859

      The minimum fee is 222,000 roubles per year.

      In the Kinesh Socio-Rehabitation Centre, a cup of tea was spoken about Creation

      Education and youth 1 423

      The boys were visiting Herei Roman Posopkin.

      Bishop Kineshsky and Palechski Ilarion has committed the great water drain

      Society and Life 1 566

      God's liturgy went to the Troicco-Uspen Café.

      A resident of Yurievza had a debosch in the hotel, threatening the axe.

      Society and Life 0 682

      Criminal proceedings have been initiated.

      In Kineshme, the effects of another heavy snow fall are being eliminated

      CFC and improvement 0 568

      At certain sites, the arc height increased by 15 to 20 centimetres.

      Despite the snow buran, the Kineshians came to burial.

      Society and Life 1 2337

      Photo, Video portage from the place of cresation.

      A large and no unnecessary hockey box on the outskirts of Kineshma was lighted.

      CFC and improvement 15 2659

      This winter, like the last one, the construction at a former airport is drowning in the snow.

      In the Kinesh Division, the UK summarized the work for 2023

      Society and Life 4 1131

      A total of 168 crimes were investigated.
